0: RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING CONCHITA CLAUDIO CARPIO-MORALES AS ONE OF THE AWARDEES OF THE PRESTIGIOUS RAMON MAGSAYSAY AWARDS FOR 2016, RECOGNIZES HER MORAL COURAGE AND COMMITMENT TO JUSTICE; PROMOTING BY HER EXAMPLE OF INCORRUPTIBILITY, DILIGENCE, VISION AND LEADERSHIP, THE HIGHEST ETHICAL STANDARDS IN PUBLIC SERVICE
